Uses of Interface
org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.CoderProvider

  • Packages that use CoderProvider 
    Package Description
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders
    Defines Coders to specify how data is encoded to and decoded from byte strings.
    org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.protobuf
    Defines a Coder for Protocol Buffers messages, ProtoCoder.

    • Uses of CoderProvider in org.apache.beam.sdk.coders

      Classes in org.apache.beam.sdk.coders that implement CoderProvider 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CoderRegistry
      A CoderRegistry allows registering the default Coder to use for a Java class, and looking up and instantiating the default Coder for a Java type.
      Fields in org.apache.beam.sdk.coders declared as CoderProvider 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static CoderProvider SerializableCoder.PROVIDER
      A CoderProvider that constructs a SerializableCoder for any class that implements serializable.
      static CoderProvider AvroCoder.PROVIDER 
      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.coders that return CoderProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CoderProvider CoderProviders.firstOf(CoderProvider... coderProviders)
      Returns a CoderProvider that consults each of the provider coderProviders and returns the first Coder provided.
      static <T> CoderProvider CoderProviders.fromStaticMethods(Class<T> clazz)
      Creates a CoderProvider built from particular static methods of a class that implements Coder.
      CoderProvider CoderRegistry.getFallbackCoderProvider()
      Returns the fallback CoderProvider for this registry.
      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.coders with parameters of type CoderProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CoderProvider CoderProviders.firstOf(CoderProvider... coderProviders)
      Returns a CoderProvider that consults each of the provider coderProviders and returns the first Coder provided.
      void CoderRegistry.setFallbackCoderProvider(CoderProvider coderProvider)
      Sets the fallback CoderProvider for this registry.

    • Uses of CoderProvider in org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.protobuf

      Methods in org.apache.beam.sdk.coders.protobuf that return CoderProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CoderProvider ProtoCoder.coderProvider()
      A CoderProvider that returns a ProtoCoder with an empty ExtensionRegistry.
